name: pg-models
description: ORM to use with your existing pg driver code. Write new code using ORM essentials and make it work with existing code without modifying it.

scripts.docs: rm README.md; cp INSTALL.md README.md; jsdoc2md index.js >> README.md
scripts.publish-patch: npm run docs && git add . && git commit -m 'docs & version: update' && git push && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Abdullah Yasir
